ValidationRule.description: Cannot submit for RMA when in NEW, RESOLVED, CLOSED, allow only in IP, WOC, VH
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT( ISPICKVAL( RMA_Type__c , "")), ( ISPICKVAL( L2_Approval_Status__c , "")),
OR ( ISPICKVAL(Status,'New'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'Resolved'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'Closed') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To continue RMA Processing, move the Case to 'In Progress'.
